body_html:
@dmasmont thanks I have already seen this tutorial. I am still trying, but thanks for your hint :)

By the way, you can use PyCuda or CudaPy packages which will enable you to run the code on GPU with Python. I hope I will be able to implement CoordConv in caffe2. Did you integrate your implementation into Faster-RCNN and Mask-RCNN? were you able to train them with CoordConv?

body:
@dmasmont thanks I have already seen this tutorial. I am still trying, but thanks for your hint :)

By the way, you can use PyCuda or CudaPy packages which will enable you to run the code on GPU with Python. I hope I will be able to implement CoordConv in caffe2. Did you integrate your implementation into Faster-RCNN and Mask-RCNN? were you able to train them with CoordConv?
